updates.title: Annual Conference Registration Open
updates.content: Registration is now open for our annual conference! Join us for three days of workshops, talks, and networking opportunities.

updates.title: New Workshop Series Announced
updates.content: New workshop series announced: "Advanced Penetration Testing Techniques" starting next month.

updates.title: Spring CTF Competition Results
updates.content: Congratulations to the winners of our Spring CTF competition! Check out the write-ups on our blog.

updates.title: New Industry Partnership
updates.content: We're excited to announce our new partnership with CyberSec Industries to provide more training opportunities.

updates.title: YouTube Channel Milestone
updates.content: Our YouTube channel has reached 10,000 subscribers! Thank you for your support.
